FROM ( SELECT ROT_REQ_DT, OLD_CUST_ID, OLD_CUST_NAME, NEW_CUST_ID, NEW_CUST_NAME, STATUS, ROT_REASON_BEFORE, ROT_REASON_AFTER, /* LAG(ROT_REQ_DT) OVER (ORDER BY REQ_DT) AS PREVIOUS_REQ_DT */ LAG(ROT_REQ_DT) OVER (ORDER BY REQ_DT DESC) AS NEXT_REQ_DT, APP_Type_ID FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(A.SO_EXCHG_CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') ROT_REQ_DT, A.SO_EXCHG_OLD_CUST_ID OLD_CUST_ID, B.NAME OLD_CUST_NAME, A.SO_EXCHG_NW_CUST_ID NEW_CUST_ID, C.NAME NEW_CUST_NAME, D.CODE STATUS, '' ROT_REASON_BEFORE, '' ROT_REASON_AFTER, A.SO_EXCHG_CRT_DT REQ_DT, C.TYPE_ID as APP_Type_ID FROM SAL0004D A JOIN SAL0029D B ON A.SO_EXCHG_OLD_CUST_ID = B.CUST_ID JOIN SAL0029D C ON A.SO_EXCHG_NW_CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID JOIN SYS0038M D ON A.SO_EXCHG_STUS_ID = D.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE A.SO_ID = #{salesOrdID}
